inscription:
kyo_ka
Japanese: Isogutomo kokoroshite yuke ??? wa, atomodori sen ame no Tsuchyama
No matter how hurry you are in, you\'d better be careful passing through the valley in Suzuka. Tsuchiyama is always rainy.
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: View of the Suzuka Mountain in Tsuchiyama
